description:
Stay seen on low-light rides, runs or walks. More visible than a sash, and much more breathable than a reflective vest, the Flexi-Viz belt is comfortable enough you'll forget its there.

  • One size fits all adjustable design
  • Quick-drying lightweight materials
  • Front and rear reflective panels
name: Proviz Flexi-Viz Cycling Belt - Unisex
